Component.label: Logout

SiteViewProperty.Description: Specifies the public site view to which the operation must redirect the user. Clicking the activation button opens the site view selection dialog box, which lists the available public site views.

Component.Description: A logout operation terminates the user's session and redirects the user to the home page or to the operation of a public site view.

BooleanProperty.label: Invalidate Session
BooleanProperty.Description: If checked, the user session is invalidated on logout.
